bill.title: Prohibition on certain state agency contracts. Provides that an agency of the state may not contract with or make a grant to an entity that trains or supervises health care providers to perform abortions. Provides that an appropriation to pay for a contract with or a grant made to an entity that trains or supervises health care providers to perform abortions is canceled. Requires the budget agency to: (1) determine that funds are not available for any contract with or grant made to an entity that trains or supervises health care providers to perform abortions; and (2) terminate the contract

history.action: Authored by Senators Zay and Kruse
First reading: referred to Committee on Judiciary
